Package ood.database.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConcurentTransactionDatabaseException
    This exception is generated when the user attempt to access in an nested way, two functions of the database.
    ConstraintsNotRespectedDatabaseException
    This exception is generated when the constraints of the database are not respected.
    DatabaseException
    This exception is the generic exception used if a problem into the database occurs
    DatabaseIntegrityException
    This exception means that the integrity of the database is compromised.
    DatabaseVersionException
    This exception is generated when the loaded SqlJet database does not correspond to the correspondent table classes.
    FieldDatabaseException
    This exception occurs when the given fields does not corresponds with a table.
    RecordNotFoundDatabaseException
    This exception is generated if the user attempted to process an operation with a record which does not exists into the database.
